mapper.select: select b.name as role, b.id as roleId from sys_user_role_relation a inner join sys_role b on a.role_id = b.id where a.user_id = #{id}
select c.name as name, c.sort as sort, c.id as id from sys_role a inner join sys_role_menu b on a.id = b.role_id inner join sys_menu c on a.menu_id = c.id where a.id = #{id}
select count(0) from sys_user a left join sys_user_role_relation b on a.id = b.user_id left join sys_role c on b.role_id = c.id where c.name = #{name}
